attributes.action: convert the Channel Tunnel into a giant sewer sending all British waste to France
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the rapidly increasing population anticipated in the coming years, it seems a reasonable solution to avoid our green and pleasant land becoming brown and unpleasant.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
